description: Order of real Clifford group L_n connected with Barnes-Wall lattices in dimension 2^n.
links: G. Nebe, E. M. Rains and N. J. A. Sloane, Self-Dual Codes and Invariant Theory, Springer, Berlin, 2006.
A. R. Calderbank, E. M. Rains, P. W. Shor and N. J. A. Sloane, Quantum error correction via codes over GF(4), IEEE Trans. Inform. Theory, 44 (1998), 1369-1387.
G. Nebe, E. M. Rains and N. J. A. Sloane, The invariants of the Clifford groups, Des. Codes Crypt. 24 (2001), 99-121.
Index entries for sequences related to Barnes-Wall lattices
Index entries for sequences related to groups
mathematica: a[0] = 2; a[n_] := 2^(n^2+n+2) * (2^n-1) * Product[2^(2*i)-1, {i, 1, n-1}]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 8}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jul 16 2015, after Maple *)
crossrefs: 2^(2n+2) times order of Chevalley group D_n (2) (cf. A001308). Twice A014115. See also A014116, A003956 (for the complex group).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Peter Shor_
